Please allow the location permission to be enabled so that you can normally use the bluetooth search connection function Please allow location permissions to be enabled so that you can use the bluetooth search connection and map location functions normally Please allow the storage permission to be enabled so that you can use the avatar setup function normally location Please allow the necessary permissions so that you can use the caller alert function normally Allow the necessary permissions so that you can use the message reminder function properly Please allow vibration permissions to be enabled so that you can normally use the search phone function
